crises.name: Wealth Tax Rebellion
crises.description: Economic crisis triggered by capital flight and market manipulation in response to wealth tax implementation, leading to class tensions and economic instability.

crises.name: Palestine Military Aid Controversy
crises.description: International crisis erupts over military aid policies and their impact on Palestinian civilians, leading to global protests and diplomatic tensions.

crises.name: Surveillance State Backlash
crises.description: Mass protests erupt after leaked documents reveal extensive domestic surveillance program targeting social movements and activists, leading to constitutional crisis.
